contentrichtext.text: '''NCP''' may refer to: ==Politics== * [[National Coalition Party]], a Finnish political party * [[National Congress (Sudan)|National Congress Party]], a Sudanese political party * [[Nationalist Congress Party]], an Indian political party * [[New Communist Party]], a British political party * [[National Centrist Party]], a Libyan political party ==Computing== * [[NetWare Core Protocol]], a network protocol used in Novell NetWare * [[Network Control Program]], the original protocol suite of the ARPANET * [[IBM Network Control Program]], a program run on IBM programmable communications controllers * [[Network Control Protocol]], a protocol that runs atop the Point-to-Point Protocol ==Other== * [[National Car Parks]], a private car park operator in United Kingdom * [[North Celestial Pole]], an imaginary point in the sky in the Northern Hemisphere * [[National Oil and Hazardous Substances Pollution Contingency Plan|National Contingency Plan]], the United States federal government's blueprint for responding to oil spills and hazardous substance releases * [[North Central Positronics]], a fictional company in ''The Dark Tower'' series * [[Northside College Prep]], a high-school in Chicago * [[National Centre for Physics]], a nuclear physics research laboratory and facility in Pakistan * [[IATA]] code for [[Naval Air Station Cubi Point]] {{disambiguation}}
